Content:
## [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Core/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Core.zip) Latest Release 

﻿This module provides a shared core system for all TabletopTweaks mods, and and any third party mods wishing to use TabletopTweaks systems and utilities.
## First Party Tabletop Tweaks Mods
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Base.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Base](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base).
	* Main content mod that provides numerous fixes and new content based on tabletop pathfinder.
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Reworks.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Reworks](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks). 
	* Smaller side mod to provide homebrew changes to Owlcat's new creations that I personally feel missed the mark slightly.
* [![Download zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Download zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Flanking.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Flanking](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking). 
	* Smaller side mod to provide PnP style flanking and related mechanics.

## Third Party Tabletop Tweaks Mods
* [Microscopic Content Expansion](https://github.com/alterasc/MicroscopicContentExpansion)
	* Add microscopic amount of new features. May or may not grow further in scope. The latter is more likely.
* [SparsSorcerousSundries](https://github.com/TheSparhawk/SparsSorcerousSundries/releases)
	* This module provides tabletop based fixes and new content to Wrath of the Righteous.
* [Tome of the Firebrand](https://github.com/pheonix99/TomeOfTheFirebird/releases)
	* A package of spells, feats, other abilities and some fixes.

**How to install**

1. Download and install [Unity Mod Manager](https://github.com/newman55/unity-mod-manager), make sure it is at least version 0.23.0
2. Run Unity Mod Manger and set it up to find Wrath of the Righteous
3. Download the Tabletop Tweaks mod
4. Install the mod by dragging the zip file from step 5 into the Unity Mod Manager window under the Mods tab

Acknowledgments:  

-   Pathfinder Wrath of The Righteous Discord channel members
-   @Balkoth, @Narria, @edoipi, @SpaceHamster and the rest of our great Discord modding community - help.
-   PS: Wolfie's [Modding Wiki](https://github.com/WittleWolfie/OwlcatModdingWiki/wiki) is an excellent place to start if you want to start modding on your own.
-   Join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/owlcat)
Translation:
## [![Descargar zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Descargar zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Core/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Core.zip) Última Versión 

﻿Este módulo proporciona un sistema central compartido para todos los mods de TabletopTweaks, y para cualquier mod de terceros que desee usar los sistemas y utilidades de TabletopTweaks.
## Mods Oficiales de Tabletop Tweaks
* [![Descargar zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Descargar zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Base.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Base](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Base).
	* Mod principal que proporciona numerosas correcciones y nuevo contenido basado en Pathfinder de mesa.
* [![Descargar zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Descargar zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Reworks.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Reworks](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Reworks). 
	* Mod secundario más pequeño para ofrecer cambios caseros a las nuevas creaciones de Owlcat que personalmente siento que no acertaron del todo.
* [![Descargar zip](https://custom-icon-badges.herokuapp.com/badge/-Download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=download&logoColor=white "Descargar zip")](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking/releases/latest/download/TabletopTweaks-Flanking.zip) [TabletopTweaks-Flanking](https://github.com/Vek17/TabletopTweaks-Flanking). 
	* Mod secundario más pequeño para proporcionar flanqueo estilo PnP y mecánicas relacionadas.

## Mods de Terceros de Tabletop Tweaks
* [Microscopic Content Expansion](https://github.com/alterasc/MicroscopicContentExpansion)
	* Añade una cantidad microscópica de nuevas características. Puede o no crecer en alcance. Lo último es más probable.
* [SparsSorcerousSundries](https://github.com/TheSparhawk/SparsSorcerousSundries/releases)
	* Este módulo ofrece correcciones basadas en mesa y nuevo contenido para Wrath of the Righteous.
* [Tome of the Firebrand](https://github.com/pheonix99/TomeOfTheFirebird/releases)
	* Un paquete de conjuros, hazañas, otras habilidades y algunas correcciones.

**Cómo instalar**

1. Descarga e instala [Unity Mod Manager](https://github.com/newman55/unity-mod-manager), asegúrate de que sea al menos la versión 0.23.0
2. Ejecuta Unity Mod Manager y configúralo para encontrar Wrath of the Righteous
3. Descarga el mod Tabletop Tweaks
4. Instala el mod arrastrando el archivo zip del paso 5 a la ventana de Unity Mod Manager en la pestaña Mods

Agradecimientos:  

-   Miembros del canal de Discord de Pathfinder Wrath of The Righteous
-   @Balkoth, @Narria, @edoipi, @SpaceHamster y el resto de nuestra gran comunidad de modding en Discord - ayuda.
-   PD: La [Wiki de Modding](https://github.com/WittleWolfie/OwlcatModdingWiki/wiki) de Wolfie es un excelente lugar para comenzar si quieres empezar a hacer mods por tu cuenta.
-   Únete a nuestro [Discord](https://discord.gg/owlcat)
